title.value: Влияние плотности посадки на интенсивность питания и скорость роста сеголетков карпа
The effect of stock density on the feeding intensity and growth rate of carp underyearlings

journal.title: Belarus Fish Industry Problems : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Gadlevskaya, N.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus). Institute for Fish Industry
Tyutyunova, M.N., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus). Institute for Fish Industry

abstract.value: Fish growing speed depends on the volume and quality of feeding ration. Intensiveness of feeding, feed consumption and digestibility in its turn is exposed to temperature and hydro-chemical regimes of the ponds. The article contains the results of growing of carp underyearlings with a low stock density. The studies revealed that grown underyeralings are sufficiently provided with natural feeds, directly influencing growth rate of fingerlings and their final average specimen weight. Characteristics of feeding intensiveness of carp fingerlings are presented, structure of the rations of carp fingerlings is analyzed; the role of natural feeds in carp underyearlings' rations is evaluated. Growth speed of the carp fingerlings is calculated. The obtained breeding material is large-sized fingerlings with the average weight exceeding 40 g.
